title: Michelin Pilot BMX Racing Tires borrowing rubber tech from their Road Competition line
content:
Michelin have added two new tires to their BMX Racing line in the form of the Pilot SX ans the Pilot SX Slick. Both tires use rubber sourced from Michelin competition road bike tires, with tread patterns optimized for different track conditions and ground temperatures.
